snippet.title: Ancra Release Trailer
snippet.description:
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/970220/Ancra/


Itch.io: https://l2tdak.itch.io/ancra


Discord Community: https://discord.gg/JKk6TbbUQu


Solve cryptic puzzles, embrace or evade vengeful specters, decide who to trust and unravel a mystery.

Ancra is a narrative driven, puzzle-horror game. Explore the home of a dying photographer, and solve puzzles to access new areas.

Encounter strange, conflicting beings and discover a haunting story, piece by piece. Try to understand why you are here, who you are and what role you play in their story.
